body: Hijo de tu puta madre piece of shit!!
soo why did he reject her? hmm this author man lol

There is also some good manga which does childhood friend justice. I forgot the name but in 1 manga mc goes back in time & gets harem also becomes rich. Another in which mc steals the girl back which he promised to get married to 10 years ago. Also another 1 where mc goes back in time & ends up with her crush which is her big sister's friend kinda similar to the first 1 i mentioned but without harem. They r better than the 1 where mc is just their to suffer.

Reject her the moment she confesses u could have asked for some time to reply taken her sister's advice & choose to accept u can throw a party in her house for surprise & confess to her but u have to be a dumb bitch who wants to suffer hell even though u know the fucked up rules of ur world & die mentally & socially. Congrats she ended up with a player could have stopped it. If u had accept or the moment he said he is not virgin u could have asked her out after saying i gave it some thought. She was a nice girl loved u have big boobs also cute also a virgin not a bitch also had potential for harem. But u r the worst guy who made her confess but doesn't have the courage to give the answer she need to get so even if he is a player he is better than u who throws away happiness willingly.

Basically, he is just witnessing the life he could be having right now, but thanks to a hastened mistake, he abruptly give it away, and he feels he’s paying it by doing this. I just hope the ending of this story doesn’t end badly, I’m wishing for something more neutral. Maybe the author won’t make him do amends with the sisters, but just apologizing with Miyu and tell her he regrets rejecting her, he can still save his friendship, even if it means they won’t be together, at least they won’t feel guilty with each other

If was him, I’ll go to apologise l with all of them first with words and second with actions, to admit that he was in the wrong, and he regretted making her best friend cry, but he is going to support her happiness, and be with them when they are in need, that is the only way to amend broken bonds, and it’s not going to be a easy path, I mean he already feels he deserves this, but he can still make things right, I only say this (pls read my comment I the first chapter), because despite my lack of confidence, to me there’s nothing more to valuable than friendship, and losing a friend is actually more hurtful than losing a crush, which is why I related to the mc only a little, he’s doing this in order to recover that friendship, and that in its own is more rewarding than you might think

Didn't notice the 2 in front of the title and didn't have the time to look it up the first one.  I have to pre-face that I hate cuckoldry/NTR as I cant help but to empathize or put myself in place of the situation. So naturally I couldn't get off to this despite the stellar art work, and I was scrambling all the while trying to rationalize why someone would but themselves through a situation like this until I could find the first chapter (love plot).  Had painted the mc as a tragic figure, maybe a eunuch who could not give his love her childhood happiness of a baby so he feigns not loving her so she can move on to her true happiness? Nope, this is literally  the stupidest fuck in hentai fiction and deserves all the torment he currently resides in.  Hope the artist has some fappable material because this art is banging!

idk how I should feel about this series. On one hand the first was absolutly hilarious (like really? that read itself more like a step by step introduction on how to be a cuck/simp. Especially the part with the "blessing" had me laugh out loud xD), but this one? I kinda feel sad and angry, not for MC but mostly for the girl because let's face it her sisters are right, the wimp absolutely deseved it but she still seems to care deeply about him, maybe even still loves him to some degree. She doesn't seem to enjoy his suffering (and let's face it she is 100% aware of how he feels about it) so idk, this is just fucked up imo. Should have stayed aone shot.

Sorry my bad that wasn't quick at all. Anyway on the usual artstyle analysis, I only have to say that it is fucking fantastic. I only knew this artist through the masked doujin and so far. Good shit 8/10, can't give it a 9 or 10 though, that reserved for the few doujin at the top. Yeah, there isn't much that I had to say in detail, other than it's softer than most, the expressions do make the majority of quality scene. But it didn't mind using the very much neglected urination fetish that's very uncommon is why this stuck with me more. Probably the very thought of actually continuing with a very short but consise story is what give this a good read. I wish I could see the concept of "tachiai" expanded further to become a tankoubon of its own.
dude is really a dumbass

(post no. 2/2) As girl reject was about to leave, sullied ultra alpha heroin stopped her from doing so and instead invited her to join her and the mc with their date, saying that she would be like to know her better. Girl reject then got embarrassed and refused the offer in response to sullied ultra alpha heroin. Sullied ultra alpha heroin then insisted, saying that herself and mc won't mind her joining them, in the end she was forced to join. After the date, sullied ultra alpha heroin then blackmails girl reject with the rape video to have a threesome with her and mc, mc and girl reject are both shocked. They then had a three way snu snu in a love hotel. After that mc is finally totally over girl reject and went on with his beloved sullied ultra alpha heroin to live a happily ever after and have even more sex-- The end. God I love my imagination, if only I was good at drawing.

To the people that "feel bad" for this MC... why do you feel bad? He created the situation himself lmfao. You should pity the dumbfuck. Not feel sorry for the dumbfuck. I like the other guy way more than the MC cause he actually says what he wants. MC can go fuck himself.

@IceMochi - Not tryna read all that, but nigga, we all can agree all we want is for the MC to stop being a pussy and look for a new girl, or snag one of the girl's sisters and make love with them, this plot is bullshit. And just like @DirtyMind below said, they needa add a humiliation tag, cuz JEEZ this MC has an IQ of 0.1

I don't like to interject my thought and opinion on this matter because I value artstyle more than the story at hand. But this time I have to, don't worry it'll be quick. "Suck it cuck, your dumbass created this situation in the first place. I'm not gonna feel bad for a shitty retard that couldn't sort out his thought, all you had to do was to said let me have some time to think before downright rejected her. You're the only person here deserving more of a beatdown physically cause mentally ain't do jack shit on your retaded ass. I'm glad for the dude that cuck you, he's more of man than your sorry ass cuck will ever dreamt of"

(post no. 1.2/2) After the rape event we get a wholesome one cause the sullied ultra alpha heroin ended up being jealous and horny in which she was really flat out honest in showing it to the now ultra alpha mc, the ultra alpha mc got embarrassed and they went all lovey dovey. After some time, during a date with sullied ultra alpha heroin and ultra alpha mc, they meet girl reject (I'll call her that now), girl reject haven't heard word from the mc for some time now cause mc went on living at sullied ultra alpha heroin's place so girl reject hesitantly greeted the mc while not knowing who's the girl the mc's with. Ultra alpha mc then greeted girl reject in a confident manner and even introduced  his beloved girlfriend (sullied ultra alpha heroin) and said that they're on a date in a flaunting manner. Girl reject got taken back from what the now ultra alpha mc has said to her, more importantly, she was taken back as to how much the mc has changed. Girl reject then went on excuse herself.

(post no. 1/2) Hear me out. Imagine if this ultra beta mc meets a sullied ultra Alpha heroin that finally wants to settle down and have serious relationship. The two then spends some time and the sullied ultra alpha heroin he ultra alpha heroin then confessed to trash mc, they became a couple as sullied ultra alpha  heroin didn't take no as an answer. After that, the heroin then  MOLD this dumb ultra beta mc to a proper shape (through building up his confidence and sex). When ultra beta mc FINALLY turns into proper alpha mc (all thanks to the loyal ultra alpha sullied heroin), loyal sullied ultra alpha heroin then propose a plan to rape the girl that the (now) alpha mc rejected back when he was still ultra beta mc anonymously (alpha mc and sullied ultra alpha heroin hides their face) so that the mc will be free from the past and can finally turn into an ultra alpha mc, the mc naturally accepts,the plan involves the sullied ultra alpha heroin videoing the rape event(no threesome yet).
